projects.name: AI-OS
projects.description: Complete AI operating system with web dashboard (SvelteKit), autonomous task discovery engine, and overnight innovation layer. All interconnected via shared JSON state. Dashboard is the single source of truth for everything Otto does.

projects.name: Otto Dashboard v3
projects.tagline: Native macOS menubar app for real-time Otto status
projects.description: SwiftUI menubar app showing live project status, model switching, refresh system, and full dashboard view. Auto-launches, kills duplicates, reads directly from filesystem JSON files.
projects.highlight: Native macOS ‚Äî model switching, real-time status

projects.name: Otto Voice
projects.tagline: Real-time LAN voice conversation with Otto
projects.description: Full-duplex voice system using Faster-Whisper (STT) + Ollama/qwen3:32b (LLM) + Piper/Kokoro TTS on Windows PC with RTX 5090. WebSocket-based, settings UI, context bridge syncing knowledge from text Otto.

projects.name: MindMapForge
projects.tagline: Voice-enabled mind maps with three TTS modes
projects.description: The first mind map that thinks back. Three voice modes (MOSS/Piper/OpenAI), intelligent auto-generation with ghost nodes, auto-layout switching, and voice commands. Outputs AI-ready super prompts. Top-of-funnel for Made With Chat.

projects.name: StyleForge
projects.description: Professional design system tool: Stage 1 captures user preferences (colors, mood, industry), Stage 2 generates 5 personalized style directions with live previews and mix-and-match capabilities.

projects.name: TellAnything
projects.description: Full-featured anonymous confession platform with custom reaction system (ü•±üëéüëçüò±üí¨), threaded replies, Top 10 leaderboards with Today/Month/Year filters, provocative parallax hero, and dock magnification effect.

projects.name: Pipeline Showcase
projects.tagline: Visual showcase of the Specification-Driven Pipeline
projects.description: Animated SVG pipeline diagram with vertical trunk, review loop animation, traveling dots, score badges, and results panel. Compares our spec-driven approach with Serhii's /spawn-team pattern.
projects.highlight: Animated SVG pipeline with review loop

projects.name: YouTube Insights
projects.description: Dark-themed dashboard with animated bar charts, video cards with thumbnails, donut charts, and fun facts. Analyzes 280 liked videos across 14 categories with AI-focused deep dive.

projects.name: MWC Velocity Report
projects.tagline: Go-to-market velocity tracking for Made With Chat
projects.description: Marketing velocity dashboard tracking content pipeline, social reach, competitor analysis, and launch readiness for the Made With Chat AI cofounder product.

projects.name: Otto Audit Page
projects.tagline: Live job submission and tracking for Otto
projects.description: Submit audit jobs from phone, watch them process in real-time. Cards show ‚è≥ Queued ‚Üí üî® Working ‚Üí ‚úÖ Done. Panic undo button for rollbacks. Polls MCP server every 3 seconds.

projects.name: Otto MCP Server
projects.tagline: ChatGPT ‚Üî Otto bridge via Model Context Protocol
projects.description: Custom JSON-RPC server connecting ChatGPT to Otto's automation pipeline. Cloudflare tunnel at otto.workwithchat.com. Handles task submission, status tracking, and CLI backend routing.
